data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "People have different ways of dealing with stress and difficulty. Some read, some exercise, and some listen to music. What do you do to reduce stress? Include specific details and examples in your answer."
data.answer: I reduce stress by observing the night sky. I have a computerized telescope that can see the details of the moon and even the Saturn ring clearly. Whenever I feel stressed or anxious because I have too much academic work to do, I would go out at night and watch the stars, nebulae, and planets. The night sky and the moon with a soft brightness can always heal me. The reason why I am so obsessed with observing the stars is that I loved the universe since a young age. It is so mysterious and peaceful. Hence, it is the best cure for me to release pressure and reduce stress. (110 words)
